famous quote:
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
-Maya Angelou (in "I know Why The Caged Bird Sings")
Interview Text:
Gloria's Story:

I sat next to Gloria on a plane back to Colorado for Christmas and we talked the whole time. She told me that she heard God very clearly one time in her life. It was a long time ago when her husband had moved to Georgia to be with her and now she felt he was mad at her for it because it was hard finding a job down there and things were hard. 

"I was lying next to my husband praying about what to do. I would pray each night, but my husband doesn't really pray much. And I heard very clearly, "Who do you think brought you here?"

"It wasn't like a voice in my ears," She motioned to her ears. "I felt it inside." She patted her stomach, still not sure how to describe where she felt it. "It was after I had told everything to God and I stopped speaking. That's when I heard it. It was so peaceful. It was quiet."
Music Video Instructions: If you're hurting, and you feel alone, hear God telling you to hold on; you are not alone.
